summary.para: The get_IPDisplay method gets the decoding resolution.

param.name: displayPix
param.para: Receives a member of the enumerated type, specifying the decoding resolution.

summary.para: The put_IPDisplay method sets the decoding resolution.

param.name: displayPix
param.para: Member of the enumerated type, specifying the decoding resolution. The meaning of this value depends on whether the current format is NTSC or PAL. The filter determines at run time which format applies, based on the media type.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful; otherwise, returns E_FAIL or another error code.

remarks.para: This method will fail if the filter is already streaming media data.

summary.para: The IIPDVDec interface provides methods for setting and retrieving properties on the DV Video Decoder filter.
